idea-plugin.name: Java Code Helper
idea-plugin.description:
Customized java code development plug-in，For learning plug-in development，welcome to exchange ideas。Source code ：gitee

  • Generate Java code based on SQL for table building, support custom templates, see gitee for rules
  • One-click generation of class conversion constructors
  • One-click translation (Internet connection required)
  • Fast jump between feign and service module controller

很蛋疼，官方要求必须英文开始

定制化java代码开发插件，用于学习插件开发，欢迎交流想法。源码地址 ：gitee

  • 根据建表SQL生成Java代码，支持自定义模板，规则见gitee
  • 一键生成类转换的构造函数
  • 一键翻译（需联网）
  • feign、服务模块controller的相互快捷跳转
